meanings.definition: A member of the old aristocracy in Russia, next in rank to a prince.
meanings.sent1: The boyars advised the prince on important matters.
meanings.sent2: The boyars lived in grand estates and held significant influence.
meanings.sent3: The boyars organized a fancy ball for the prince, but they all tripped on their robes!
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of knowledge, the boyars were the wise counselors to the prince.
meanings.sent5: The boyars, with their noble attire and wise words, were like living history books.

meanings.definition: A member of a Russian aristocratic class.
meanings.sent1: The boyars attended the royal banquet in their finest attire.
meanings.sent2: The boyars were respected for their lineage and wealth.
meanings.sent3: The boyars tried to outdo each other in a friendly horse race.
meanings.sent4: In the world of elegance, the boyars were the epitome of grace and sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The boyars, with their elegant manners and refined tastes, were the envy of the town.
